com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.event.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    com.flamingOctoIronman.core.event  
    com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.event
    This package is a framework for handles events.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager
    This class houses the framework for making Managers and controlling them via ManagerMangers.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.HID.inputEvents  

    • Uses of Event in com.flamingOctoIronman.core.event

      Subclasses of Event in com.flamingOctoIronman.core.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CoreEvent
      This class is an abstract implementation of Event.
      class  GameLoopEvent
      This CoreEvent is published whenever there is a tick.
      class  InitializationEvent
      This CoreEvent is published during the initialization part of the game's life.
      class  PostInitializationEvent
      This CoreEvent is published during the post-initialization part of the game's life.
      class  ShutDownEvent
      This CoreEvent is published during the shutdown part of the game's life.
      class  StartUpEvent
      This CoreEvent is published during the startup part of the game's life.
